code: import React from"react";import{Parallax,ParallaxLayer}from'@react-spring/parallax';import WhiteCard from"./WhiteCard";import vehicleHILBench from'../assets/images/vehicle_hil_bench.jpg';import virtualDrivingHILBench from'../assets/images/virtual_driving_hil_bench.jpg';import bothSystems from'../assets/images/both_systems.jpg';import{Grid}from'@mui/material';import{Slide}from'react-reveal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Systems(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"centered-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Parallax,{pages:3.3,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{speed:0.01,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{top:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Vehicle HIL Bench"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{left:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{offset:0.3,speed:1,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(vehicleHILBench,")"),backgroundSize:'cover'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{bottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:30,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["The vehicle HIL bench is divided into subsystems in the form of a topological hierarchy, and are interconnected ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"with one another by means of electrical transmission media such as cables, wires and connectors carrying analog ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"and digital signals. This bench provides the capability to supply accurate, real-world input to a digital twin of ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"a production vehicle by utilizing the hardware components that comprise it."]})})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{speed:0.01,offset:1.1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{bottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Virtual Driving HIL Bench"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{left:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{offset:1.4,speed:1,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(virtualDrivingHILBench,")"),backgroundSize:'cover'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:30,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["The virtual driving HIL bench provides a highly streamlined platform consisting of tools that enable the ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"rapid, repeatable, accurate, and nearly endless testing of a digital twin of real life vehicles. This ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"system will allow users to gain valuable simulation and testing data of hardware and software components ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"in a manner which is not always feasible using the traditional methods of autonomous vehicle testing."]})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{speed:0.01,offset:2.2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{bottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Benefits of the Systems"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{left:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{offset:2.6,speed:1,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(bothSystems,")"),backgroundSize:'cover'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{direction:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:10,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["The appeal of the presented systems are primarily to be targeted towards companies and manufacturers ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"focused in the automotive industry, particularly the autonomous vehicle industry. These systems in ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"conjunction provide capabilities which have not yet been explored in such an open-source manner. One ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"major development the systems bring forth is the introduction of a devops pipeline for vehicle ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"platforms. As software and application development for road vehicles becomes more commonplace in the ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"industry, the systems presented will allow application development for vehicles to be streamlined by ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"facilitating the development and execution of test cases as well as the examination of key ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"interactions between the hardware and software components."]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Another major point benefit introduced by the systems is the modular nature. This opens the door for manufacturers of third party components to be able to more thoroughly ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"test, integrate, and simulate them in a controlled environment to ensure the behavior of the components ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"are as expected."]})})})]})})})]})});}export default Systems;
